oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Charlie Louvin at West Jr. High Gym
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008; Wright, Sonny; Peggy Sue; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the Grand Ole Opry stars Charlie Louvin, Charlie Walker, Peggy Sue and Sonny Wright at the West Junior High Gym on August 30. Poster features metal photoplates of Charlie Louvin, Charlie Walker and Peggy Sue and Sonny Wright. Poster was ordered by Ray Clark (purchase order 16715). To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21059.
